mapper.select: select count(agree.id) as increaseNumber, count(case when agree.state = 4 then 1 end ) as solveNumber, date_format( agree.gmt_create,'%Y-%m') as groupYear from bus_agreement agree where agree.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY date_format( agree.gmt_create,'%Y-%m') limit 12
select count(agree.id) as totalNumber from bus_agreement agree where agree.is_delete = 0 and date_format( agree.gmt_create,'%Y-%m') <= #{condition.endTime}
